glsa.title: Perl Config-IniFiles Module: Insecure temporary file usage
glsa.synopsis: An insecure temporary file usage has been reported in the Perl Config-IniFiles module, possibly allowing symlink attacks.

background.p: Config-IniFiles is a Perl module for reading .ini-style configuration files.

description.p: The Perl Config-IniFiles module uses predicatable temporary file names.

impact.p: A local attacker could perform symlink attacks to overwrite arbitrary files with the privileges of the user running the application.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All users of the Perl Config-IniFiles module should upgrade to the latest version:
